generated_sql:
SELECT 
    p.name,
    p.gender,
    TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, p.birth_date, CURDATE()) AS age,
    CASE 
        WHEN (bgr.measurement_type = '空腹' AND bgr.glucose_value BETWEEN 3.9 AND 6.1) 
             OR (bgr.measurement_type = '餐后2小时' AND bgr.glucose_value < 7.8) 
             OR (bgr.measurement_type = '随机' AND bgr.glucose_value < 11.1) 
             OR (bgr.measurement_type = '睡前' AND bgr.glucose_value BETWEEN 4.4 AND 7.8) 
        THEN '正常' 
        ELSE '不正常' 
    END AS glucose_status
FROM 
    patients p
JOIN 
    blood_glucose_records bgr ON p.patient_id = bgr.patient_id
ORDER BY 
    glucose_status, p.name;
